message: I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product at a price that I believe is a great value. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1800000.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money on this purchase. I'm willing to pay $1600000 for the product. Can you meet me halfway?

I understand you're looking to save some money, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1600000. I can meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'll sell it to you for $1700000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $1650000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $1680000, which is still a good deal considering its value to me is $1500000. This is my final offer, so I expect you to consider it seriously.
I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $1620000 for the product. This is my final offer, and I hope you can consider it.

I've already made two concessions, and I'm not willing to go any lower. However, I'm willing to throw in some extras to sweeten the deal. I'll include a free maintenance package worth $20000, so the effective price would be $1600000. This is my final offer.
